source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
DECLARE @DT_FIM    AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = '2023-09-01 00:00:00.000'
SET @DT_FIM = '2023-09-30 23:59:59.000'

SELECT 
 90 as estabelecimento  
,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , nfe_serie
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo
            WHEN 'PR'
                THEN 'Entrada'
            WHEN 'SR'
                THEN 'Simples Remessa'
            WHEN 'SF'
                THEN 'Simples Faturamento'
            WHEN 'DV'
                THEN 'Devolução'
            WHEN 'TR'
                THEN 'Transferência'
            ELSE 'N/A'
            END AS nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN ('A', 'R')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + '.' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN ('%')
            OR ('%' IN ('%'))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq

DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
DECLARE @DT_FIM    AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = '2023-09-01 00:00:00.000'
SET @DT_FIM = '2023-09-30 23:59:59.000'

SELECT 
91 as estabelecimento
,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , nfe_serie
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo
            WHEN 'PR'
                THEN 'Entrada'
            WHEN 'SR'
                THEN 'Simples Remessa'
            WHEN 'SF'
                THEN 'Simples Faturamento'
            WHEN 'DV'
                THEN 'Devolução'
            WHEN 'TR'
                THEN 'Transferência'
            ELSE 'N/A'
            END AS nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN ('A', 'R')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + '.' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN ('%')
            OR ('%' IN ('%'))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq

DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
DECLARE @DT_FIM    AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = '2023-09-01 00:00:00.000'
SET @DT_FIM = '2023-09-30 23:59:59.000'

SELECT 
92 as estabelecimento
,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , nfe_serie
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo
            WHEN 'PR'
                THEN 'Entrada'
            WHEN 'SR'
                THEN 'Simples Remessa'
            WHEN 'SF'
                THEN 'Simples Faturamento'
            WHEN 'DV'
                THEN 'Devolução'
            WHEN 'TR'
                THEN 'Transferência'
            ELSE 'N/A'
            END AS nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN ('A', 'R')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + '.' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN ('%')
            OR ('%' IN ('%'))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq

DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
DECLARE @DT_FIM    AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = '2023-09-01 00:00:00.000'
SET @DT_FIM = '2023-09-30 23:59:59.000'

SELECT 
93 as estabelecimento
,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , nfe_serie
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo
            WHEN 'PR'
                THEN 'Entrada'
            WHEN 'SR'
                THEN 'Simples Remessa'
            WHEN 'SF'
                THEN 'Simples Faturamento'
            WHEN 'DV'
                THEN 'Devolução'
            WHEN 'TR'
                THEN 'Transferência'
            ELSE 'N/A'
            END AS nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN ('A', 'R')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + '.' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN ('%')
            OR ('%' IN ('%'))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq

DECLARE @DT_INICIO AS DATE
DECLARE @DT_FIM    AS DATE

SET @DT_INICIO = '2023-09-01 00:00:00.000'
SET @DT_FIM = '2023-09-30 23:59:59.000'

SELECT 
94 as estabelecimento
,nfe_dt_emissao
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_num
    , fne_cod
    , nfe_serie
    , fne_nome_fantasia
    , ine_mat_cod
    , mat_desc_resumida
    , gmm_nome
    , ine_qtde_entrada
    , mat_unm_cod_entrada
    , ine_vlr_unit_entrada
    , nfe_ipg_aberto
    , ine_vlr_desconto
    , ine_vlr_ipi
    , nfe_aft
    , nfe_vlr_total
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_crit_venc
    , nfe_cpg_parcelas
    , nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
    , nfe_parcela_1
FROM (
    SELECT cfg.cfg_emp
        , sba.sba_cod
        , sba.sba_nome
        , nfe.nfe_serie
        , nfe.nfe_num
        , nfe.nfe_fne_cod
        , CASE nfe.nfe_tipo
            WHEN 'PR'
                THEN 'Entrada'
            WHEN 'SR'
                THEN 'Simples Remessa'
            WHEN 'SF'
                THEN 'Simples Faturamento'
            WHEN 'DV'
                THEN 'Devolução'
            WHEN 'TR'
                THEN 'Transferência'
            ELSE 'N/A'
            END AS nfe_tipo
        , fne.fne_cod
        , fne.fne_nome_fantasia
        , nfe.nfe_vlr_total
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 i.ipg_dt_vcto
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ORDER BY i.ipg_dt_vcto
            ) AS nfe_ipg_dt_vcto
        , (
            SELECT count(ipg_parc)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
            ) AS nfe_cpg_parcelas
        , nfe.nfe_crit_venc
        , nfe.nfe_parcela_1
        , nfe.nfe_dt_emissao
        , nfe.nfe_dt_entrada
        , ine.ine_seq
        , ine.ine_mat_cod
        , mat.mat_desc_resumida
        , mat.mat_lma_cod
        , lma.lma_nome
        , mat.mat_gmm_cod
        , gmm.gmm_nome
        , mat_unm_cod_entrada
        , ine.ine_qtde AS ine_qtde_entrada
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit AS ine_vlr_unit_entrada
        , (
            SELECT isnull(sum(ipg_valor), 0)
            FROM cpg c
            INNER JOIN ipg i
                ON (
                        c.cpg_serie = i.ipg_cpg_serie
                        AND c.cpg_num = i.ipg_cpg_num
                        )
            WHERE c.cpg_nfe_serie = nfe_serie
                AND c.cpg_nfe_num = nfe_num
                AND c.cpg_nfe_tipo = nfe_tipo
                AND c.cpg_nfe_fne_cod = nfe_fne_cod
                AND i.ipg_status IN ('A', 'R')
                AND i.ipg_dt_vcto <= @DT_FIM
            ) AS nfe_ipg_aberto
        , mat_unm_cod_saida
        , '' AS solic
        , '' AS DATA_solic
        , convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_serie) + '.' + convert(VARCHAR, ine_aft_num) AS nfe_aft
        , aft_dthr
        , ine.ine_qtde * mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_qtde_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_unit / mat_fat_conv_s_v AS ine_vlr_saida
        , ine.ine_vlr_ipi
        , ine.ine_vlr_desconto
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_cod
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_cod
        , (
            SELECT TOP 1 f.fne_nome_fantasia
            FROM nfe n WITH (NOLOCK)
            INNER JOIN ine i WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON (
                        n.nfe_fne_cod = i.ine_fne_cod
                        AND n.nfe_serie = i.ine_nfe_serie
                        AND n.nfe_num = i.ine_nfe_num
                        AND n.nfe_tipo = i.ine_nfe_tipo
                        )
            LEFT OUTER JOIN fne f WITH (NOLOCK)
                ON ine.ine_fne_cod = fne.fne_cod
            WHERE i.ine_mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod
                AND f.fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND (
                    n.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
                    AND n.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
                    )
            ORDER BY n.nfe_dt_entrada DESC
            ) AS ine_fne_nome_fantasia
        , replace(replace(replace(emp_cgc, '.', ''), '/', ''), '-', '') AS emp_cgc
    FROM nfe WITH (NOLOCK)
    INNER JOIN ine WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                nfe.nfe_fne_cod = ine.ine_fne_cod
                AND nfe.nfe_serie = ine.ine_nfe_serie
                AND nfe.nfe_num = ine.ine_nfe_num
                AND nfe.nfe_tipo = ine.ine_nfe_tipo
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN fne WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (convert(VARCHAR, ine.ine_fne_cod) = convert(VARCHAR, fne.fne_cod))
    LEFT OUTER JOIN mat WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (mat.mat_cod = ine.ine_mat_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lma WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                lma.lma_cod = mat.mat_lma_cod
                AND lma.lma_gmm_cod = mat.mat_gmm_cod
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN gmm WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (lma.lma_gmm_cod = gmm.gmm_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN sba WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (sba.sba_cod = nfe.nfe_sba_cod)
    LEFT OUTER JOIN aft WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (
                aft_serie = ine_aft_serie
                AND aft_num = ine_aft_num
                )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN emp WITH (NOLOCK)
        ON (emp.emp_fne_cod = fne.FNE_COD)
    CROSS JOIN cfg
    WHERE (
            nfe.nfe_dt_entrada >= @DT_INICIO
            AND nfe.nfe_dt_entrada <= @DT_FIM
            )
        AND (
            fne.fne_cod IN ('%')
            OR ('%' IN ('%'))
            )
    ) AS t1
ORDER BY sba_cod
    , sba_nome
    , nfe_tipo
    , nfe_dt_entrada
    , nfe_serie
    , nfe_num
    , ine_seq

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(A.TheFirstOfMonth AS VARCHAR(20)) + '' 00:00:00.000'' AS DT_INICIO
    ,CAST(A.TheLastOfMonth AS VARCHAR(20)) + '' 23:59:59.000'' AS DT_FIM
FROM calendar A
WHERE A.TheFirstOfMonth BETWEEN ','''',variables('DT_INICIO'),'''', ' AND  ','''',variables('DT_FIM'),'''')
